amendment.description: Amendment requires the use of plain writing by the Department of the Treasury and the Small Business Administration for documents relevant to obtaining a benefit or service under the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in part C of House Report 111-506 to require the use of plain writing by the Department of the Treasury and the Small Business Administration for documents relevant to obtaining a benefit or service under the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Braley (IA) amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
